original: intros p k a b H1 H2 H3. unfold not in *. intros H4. apply H4. rewrite <- square_mult_lemma. apply mult_lemma6. - intros H5. apply H3. apply rel_prime_mult. + eapply rel_prime_sym. apply H2. + apply rel_prime_sym. apply rel_prime_mult; auto. - intros H6. apply H5. apply divides_trans with (b := p); auto. apply prime_power; auto. apply prime_div_gcd; auto. intros H7. apply divides_antisym with (a := sqr a) (b := sqr a * sqr b); auto. + apply prime_square; auto. + apply divides_trans with (b := sqr a); auto.
